Articles.Content:
So I made a shuttle. KER says that the first stage has 1.74 TWR but when I take off it just falls down the second I decouple the stability holder things. And it doesnt look like my vector engines  are firing up but they are set to the same stage as the SRB's. Any ideas?

SCREENSHOTS: https://imgur.com/a/kSDIUSP
Maybe a dumb question, is your throttle up? You look to have plenty of thrust, that's the only thing I can think of. Is there anything restricting fuel flow between the tanks and the vectors?

7 minutes ago, Ultimate Steve said:

Maybe a dumb question, is your throttle up? You look to have plenty of thrust, that's the only thing I can think of. Is there anything restricting fuel flow between the tanks and the vectors?

I guess I'm just braindead. I just realised my throttle isn't up. lol
